interval_helper: Ventilate if last ventilation in zone (either automatic or manual and detected through window sensors) is longer than n-minutes ago
m_descr:
Control window drives for optimal temperature regulation in summer and winter, ventilation and security.
Check http:/k-1.com/blob/master/README.md for detailed documentation.
max_wind_helper: Will close windows if max wind speed is reached. Windows will be opened only partially when the wind speed approaches the threshold
min_temperature_outside_helper: Will not open windows if the outside temperature falls below this temperature
optimize_helper: Optimize window operation either for best temperature, or minimal device movement
rain_sensor_device_helper: A binary sensor indicating rain. Will close windows if rain is detected. Can be a Virtual Rain Sensor module.
setpoint_diff_helper: Allows to set a temperature setpoint delta for this zone. Eg. if the desired temperature is 24°C, and the delta is set to -1, then window operation will use 23°C as the target temperature for this zone.
summer_active_helper: Enables summer operation mode. In this mode optimal cooling through ventilation will be achieved
temperature_outside_sensor_device_helper: A temperature weather data widget (eg. WeatherUnderground or ForecastIO) may be used instead of a physical device
thermostat_device_helper: A thermostat module to set the desired target temperature. If none is selected, this module will create a virtual thermostat
time_helper: Selects times of day (HH:MM) when ventilation should be checked
ventilation_active_helper: Enables regular ventilation. If this option is set this module will ensure regular ventilation for each zone
wind_sensor_device_helper: A wind module (eg from WeatherUnderground or ForecastIO) can be used instead of a physical device
window_sensors_helper: Binary sensors on windows operated manually to detect manual ventilation
winter_active_helper: Enables winter operation mode. In this mode windows will be opened if outside temperature is higher than the inside temperature
